name: Phase Rifle
content:
Description

This sleek 30th Century rifle is built for deadshot accuracy at ranges where natural eyes can't even see. Delivering a single burst payload of pure energy means that it is completely silent and without recoil.

data.description: This sleek 30th Century rifle is built for deadshot accuracy at ranges where natural eyes can't even see. Delivering a single burst payload of pure energy means that it is completely silent and without recoil.
